details: context: new tools emerge without reusable libraries
decision: require each package to expose a library target and CLI executable
entries.title: 2025-09-02 — Standardize library+CLI split

details: decision: document current async actors and isolate shared state
rationale: avoid race conditions and ease testing
entries.title: 2025-09-02 — Log concurrency audit

text: Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.
